meanings.sent1: She dissimulates her excitement when receiving a gift.
meanings.sent2: He often dissimulates his disappointment with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The detective dissimulates his surprise at the unexpected clue.
meanings.sent4: The chameleon dissimulates its color to blend into the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The magician dissimulates the secret to his tricks.

meanings.definition: Pretends not to know or be aware of something
meanings.sent1: He dissimulates his knowledge of the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: She dissimulates ignorance about the missing keys.
meanings.sent3: The child dissimulates innocence after eating the cookies.
meanings.sent4: The actor dissimulates his lines during the play.
meanings.sent5: The student dissimulates understanding of the difficult concept.
